name: Boston Imaging and Vision
tagline: the Community of Machine Visionist and Image Processers in Boston and throughout Massachusetts.
body:
Boston is one of the world's best places for machine vision and image processing, with an amazing combination of universities, research labs, companies and startups. 

Boston Imaging and Vision (BIV) is an organization dedicated to bringing the our community together in Boston and throughout Massachusetts.  We have monthly meetups where we have about 120 people per event.  Please join us at our next [meetup](http://www.meetup.com/bostonimagevision/). We also mail out monthly notices of upcoming machine vision events to folks who sign up on the meetup page.

To bring you these events, our community is sponsored by:
  << to be determined. >>

And, we have some amazing organizers dedicated to bringing the community together:

...
Samson Timoner, serial entrepreneur and founder of two machine vision companies.
Magnus Snorrason, fill it in.
Youssef Rouchdy, fill it in
...

### Social Media

We're all busy on our companies, so that we don't spend a ton of time on social media. We're starting to experiment with a hashtag,  [#BostonImageVision](https://twitter.com/search?q=BostonImageVision), people using #BostonImageVision

### Helpers

We are also looking for people to help out, and speakers. Please contact us at ???
